title: Santa's Baby
description: Remy wasn’t looking for the hottest hookup of her life when she volunteered as a Christmas elf—especially not from her ex-girlfriend's dad. But now, all she wants to sit on Santa’s lap and let him make her filthiest fantasies come true.CW: features brief mention of spousal death (he's a widower), age gap (34 & 55), light daddy kink, and consensual reverse somnophilia roleplay
author: Cassie Donoghue
